<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="360 CI Dashboard v2 default copy">95e0db5197c40ed0917df9f0f053afa4</macroponent><name>single_score_25/dataSources</name><preset/><required_translations>[
    
]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
 * @param {params} params
 * @param {api} params.api
 * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
 */
function evaluateProperty({
    api,
    helpers
}) {
    var serverMapping = {
        "cmdb_ci_linux_server": {
            server: "cruprgwhthpet01",
            serverTitle: "Linux"
        },
        "cmdb_ci_win_server": {
            server: "cruprgwhthpet00",
            serverTitle: "Windows"
        }
    };

    var { server, serverTitle } = serverMapping[api.state.ciClass] || {};

    return [{
        allowRealTime: true,
        dataCategories: ["trend"],
        filterQuery: `name=${server}`,
        id: "bWV0cmljQmFzZWNtZGJfY2lfd2luX3NlcnZlcjE3MDU2MzM0MDk3NzI=",
        isDatabaseView: false,
        label: {
            code: null,
            comment: "",
            message: `${serverTitle} Server`
        },
        preferredVisualizations: ["aba8630dc2ccc9b3c1774af1b6820696"],
        sourceType: "metricBase",
        table: api.state.ciClass
    }];
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>optimiz</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-29 16:52:48</sys_created_on><sys_id>46e0939197c40ed0917df9f0f053af3c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>single_score_25/dataSources</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Optimiz AIOps Insights" source="x_opti8_optimiz_ai">d4d83ad9878802d0e7ae55b83cbb3590</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Optimiz AIOps Insights">d4d83ad9878802d0e7ae55b83cbb3590</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_46e0939197c40ed0917df9f0f053af3c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>optimiz</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-29 16:52:48</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
